name: Miłosz Stolarski
story: Miłosz grew up in a small town in Poland. He joined the military as soon as he turned 18 and is now serving as a radio operator for the Independent faction. He is a devout Catholic and prays daily for his safety and the safety of his fellow soldiers. He tends to keep to himself and is often lost in thought. Despite his introverted nature, he is highly skilled at his job and takes his role in the military very seriously.
